title: Text not Loading and LoL webpage not showing proper info
body:
Hello,
I started League about 2 years ago, though my account may be older as I was introduced to League in 2013.
Last month, I re-downloaded League after over a year, so that I can play with my friends.

When I started playing, I noticed that some of the text is not loading. Nothing else seems to be an issue; the game runs smoothly, the in-game items have descriptions, but in the launcher, multiple things are not visible. From what I learned so far, pretty much the entire loading screen does not show text. I can still enter my username and password and log in, but I can't read them. I see some links, but the words themselves are not loading, just the arrows. When I jog in, the Quests are not visible, which is quite a hassle. The chat is invisible to me, which makes Champion select very difficult. However, the in-game chat is loading, so I believe this is only a problem in the Launcher. The names of friends are (only in the main menu) not loading, and some of my personal stats, such a game statistics are invisible to me. From what I can see, it seems small, perhaps default, the text is not loading, as the larger text and bolded once are loading. This problem seems to be only limited to text, as images and player names (while in party) are fine.
One thing to note: the settings are not loading as well, so I am mostly powerless. I also tried the Full


Edit: LoL webpage now working

Does anyone else have this problem, and does anyone know how to fix it?

ps. I will add an image in the future, can't take a screenshot right now.

replies.body: This is a strange case and I'd like us to take a closer look.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some files and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our Tech team will be able to look into this with you and figure out the cause.
